attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to extend the Seaham Town Skate Park and fit suitable lights for night time use.

Seaham Skate Park was built around a year ago and we've had quite a lot of new people starting to ride BMX, skate, it's a positive activity for youngsters of Seaham and with the growing numbers it is vital for the Skate Park to be extended.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority
